text: Oscar Baylin Goodman (born July 26, 1939) is an American attorney and politician. He was the mayor of Las Vegas, Nevada from 1999 to 2011. His wife, Carolyn Goodman, replaced him as mayor in 2011. Goodman is an Independent and a former member of the Democratic Party.Goodman Switches Party Affiliation. KXNT, Ret. December 16th 2009 Goodman is known for legalizing prostitution in Las Vegas and allowing brothels to be open in Las Vegas. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Las Vegas Category:Mayors of Las Vegas Category:Independent politicians in the United States Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Lawyers from Philadelphia
title: Oscar Goodman
